alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Jackson, northwestern Gadsden, Decatur, northwestern Grady, eastern Miller, Mitchell, Baker and eastern Seminole Counties through 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 915 PM EDT/815 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Baconton to near Chattahoochee. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Bainbridge, Camilla, Baconton, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Attapulgus, Climax, Brinson, Recovery, Harrells Still, Laingkat, Greenough, Bellview, Vada and Hopeful. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
